title: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: A creamy Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.

title: Sushi Platter
description: A delightful assortment of fresh sushi rolls and sashimi, served with soy sauce and wasabi.

title: Chicken Biryani
description: A rich and flavorful rice dish layered with marinated chicken, spices, and saffron.

title: Tacos al Pastor
description: Grilled pork tacos with pineapple, onions, and cilantro on soft corn tortillas.

title: Butter Chicken
description: Tender chicken simmered in a creamy tomato sauce infused with Indian spices.

title: Beef Pho
description: A comforting noodle soup with thin slices of beef, fresh herbs, and rice noodles.

title: Croissant
description: A buttery, flaky pastry that's a staple of French breakfasts.

title: Shawarma
description: Thinly sliced meat wrapped in flatbread with garlic sauce, veggies, and spices.
